item.title: Project Blue
item.description: Project Blue, originally standing for ‘Bottles, Linkages, and their Underlining Ergonomics,’ is my first (and only) industrial design project in which I conducted a research and redesigned the plastic bottle. I understood that polyethene terephthalate, a plastic resin and the most common type of polyester, is the material which makes the popular ‘PET’ bottles. According to the National Association for PET Container Resources (NAPCOR), the gross water bottle recycling rate was only 38.
